body:
thank you.

i sent an email with a new topic from `liam@stask.net` and didn't see it show up in the web ui after ~30-40 minutes, so tried posting from the web ui, and got feedback that my topic would be posted after it was approved (wasn't able to grab a screenshot of the specific language used).

so, assuming the msg actually shows up at some point, it appears to be all good - hoping this first msg (which might now be a double post) is just subject to additional moderation.
